channel.title: [Release] RSCKBD Source 9.0
channel.description:
These guys fudge over their player-base on a constant, wiping accounts and restarting then asking for more money, scamming their players and not even reimbursing them with the subs they paid for unless they personally ask for them, they have a policy "don't ask, don't tell" so, fudge it.
Enjoy.
http://j.gs/8994275/rsckbd
Oh this might reassure some people:
[img]http://i.snag.gy/v3Z98.jpg[/img]

item.title: [Release] RSCKBD Source 9.0
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

Damn, why did I even leave this community I miss the constant bs that flies around. Nothing like doing over a server, sums up the whole RSCPS Community, nobody likes anybody with a decent server running(not saying he has one not even been on an RSC Private Server in years, if it’s not Denial of Service attacks it’s releasing the content of the server.

Good to be back.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] RSCKBD Source 9.0
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

Classickbds:

Why is everybody mad at everybody? Unless people “stole” actual properties, I don’t see the problem for people to learn coding (even if that means copying and pasting). Like, seriously guys? RSC is never gonna go anywhere if we all can’t be friends. If anyone who thinks they know it all, why didn’t you get employ by Jagex to run RSC? I would like RSC to come back so I can low level mage pk.

Because this community is shit.

Read full topic

RSC is never gonna go anywhere if we all can’t be friends. If anyone who thinks they know it all, why didn’t you get employ by Jagex to run RSC? item.title: [Release] RSCKBD Source 9.0
item.dc:creator: @Xsnip3rX1 Xsnip3rX1
item.description:
@Xsnip3rX1 wrote:

[quote=“Aleka, post:12, topic:549673”][quote author=stEps link=topic=668561.msg4471203#msg4471203 date=1423028865]

public void sessionClosed(IoSession session) { Player player = (Player)session.getAttachment(); if(!player.destroyed()) { try { Thread.sleep(61000); } catch (InterruptedException ie) { return;// This is a timer for login by Aleka. This prevents dupes and bots. } player.destroy(false); } }

:palm: :palm: :palm:

lolol ikr

This is great lol as aleka thinks that he knows everything… nice fix bro

proof is in the puddin!
[/quote]

The really early days where a bit fun. Let me know when you get 10 players online on your dead server.

@sniper
Sniper I could be upset with you but at the end of day you are just a fat manchild with 3 kids and no money who has to live off welfare. I mean you existence is just sad. I do this for fun. At the end of the day the code really does belong to the people and I eventually plan to release it all. With that said you have never programmed in your life so you insulting me makes no difference have fun living your sad life.

This code is outdated anyways extremely. But have fun with the source let me know how it goes.

No hurt feelings here it is just a buffed up easyrsc source after all enjoy guys steps try to not steal everything for your crappy server try to come up with some ideas.[/quote]
haha unlike you i don’t live off welfare, i have a job, something you don’t know about, i’m also a programmer for my own game development company, gg.

i have never programmed anything in my life? lol, the first thing i did was create 3 new ranks on rsckbd, oh and don’t forget mythscape.

You’re a script kiddy aleka… go back to learning xml.

Read full topic

[quote=“stEps, post:6, topic:549673”][quote author=Xsnip3rX1 link=topic=668561.msg4471178#msg4471178 date=1423009418]

public void sessionClosed(IoSession session) { Player player = (Player)session.getAttachment(); if(!player.destroyed()) { try { Thread.sleep(61000); } catch (InterruptedException ie) { return;// This is a timer for login by Aleka. This prevents dupes and bots. } player.destroy(false); } }

:palm: :palm: :palm:

lolol ikr
[/quote]
This is great lol as aleka thinks that he knows everything… nice fix bro

proof is in the puddin![/quote]

The really early days where a bit fun. Let me know when you get 10 players online on your dead server.

@sniper
Sniper I could be upset with you but at the end of day you are just a fat manchild with 3 kids and no money who has to live off welfare. I mean you existence is just sad. I do this for fun. At the end of the day the code really does belong to the people and I eventually plan to release it all. With that said you have never programmed in your life so you insulting me makes no difference have fun living your sad life.

This code is outdated anyways extremely. But have fun with the source let me know how it goes.

No hurt feelings here it is just a buffed up easyrsc source after all enjoy guys steps try to not steal everything for your crappy server try to come up with some ideas.
